languages.text: "Лес — наш дом. Но лес злится. Говорящий-с-Богами умилостивит лес, и мы заживем как прежде".
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."
languages.original_text: "Лес — наш дом. Но лес злится. Говорящий-с-Богами умилостивит лес, и мы заживем как прежде".

traits.locale_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest, and we will live as we have before."
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest, and we will live as we have before."
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we have before."
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we have before."
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."
"The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

languages.text: “这座森林是我们的家，但它现在非常生气。‘神谕’可以安抚这座森林，让我们的生活变回原来的样子。”
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: “这座森林是我们的家，但它现在非常生气。‘神谕’可以安抚这座森林，让我们的生活变回原来的样子。”

languages.text: "Der Wald ist unsere Heimat. Doch der Wald ist zornig. Spricht-mit-den-Göttern wird den Wald besänftigen, dann leben wir wieder wie zuvor."
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: "Der Wald ist unsere Heimat. Doch der Wald ist zornig. Spricht-mit-den-Göttern wird den Wald besänftigen, dann leben wir wieder wie zuvor."

languages.text: «El bosque es nuestro hogar. Pero el bosque está furioso. Habla-con-Dioses aplacará la ira del bosque y seguiremos viviendo como hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: «El bosque es nuestro hogar. Pero el bosque está furioso. Habla-con-Dioses aplacará la ira del bosque y seguiremos viviendo como hasta ahora».

languages.text: « La forêt est notre foyer, mais elle est en colère. Parle-aux-Dieux l'apaisera et nous pourrons alors recommencer à vivre normalement. »
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: « La forêt est notre foyer, mais elle est en colère. Parle-aux-Dieux l'apaisera et nous pourrons alors recommencer à vivre normalement. »

languages.text: 「森は私たちの家。でも森は怒っている。神々との語り部が森を鎮めれば、私たちは以前と同じように暮らすことができる」
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: 「森は私たちの家。でも森は怒っている。神々との語り部が森を鎮めれば、私たちは以前と同じように暮らすことができる」

languages.text: "Orman bizim yuvamızdır ama orman öfkeli. Tanrıların Dili, ormanı yatıştıracak ve biz de eski yaşamlarımıza devam edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The forest is our home. But the forest is angry. Speaks-With-Gods will appease the forest and we will live as we did before."

traits.locale_text: "Orman bizim yuvamızdır ama orman öfkeli. Tanrıların Dili, ormanı yatıştıracak ve biz de eski yaşamlarımıza devam edeceğiz."
